text: Gregory Pokie (born in 29 July 1987), is a Surinamese football player who plays for Walking Boyz Company. ==Club career== Pokie had a lengthy spell with Inter Moengotapoe and also played for FCS National and BotopasiGregory Pokie maakt de overstap van IMT naar Botopasi - Natio Suriname before joining WBC. In the 2015/16 season he was voted Surinam League player of the year, becoming the first Saramaccan player and the first from Brownsweg to win the trophy.Gregory Pokie: de eerste Saramaccaanse speler van Brownsweg die beste voetballer van het jaar werd - Natio Suriname ==International career== He made his debut for Suriname in an April 2009 friendly match against French Guyana and earned a total of 23 caps, scoring one goal. ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Suriname's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:100%;" !
